headline.main: Eskimos of the Far North Aid Hitler Defeat, Bishop of the Arctic Says in Sermon Here

lead_paragraph: Even the Eskimos in the Arctic Circle are contributing toward the fight against Hitler because they feel strongly about "that bad man who is taking people away from their hunting grounds and making them work elsewhere," the Right Rev. Archibald Lang Fleming, Protestant Episcopal Bishop of the Arctic, reported yesterday in a sermon as guest preacher at the Cathedral of St. John the Divine.
abstract: Bishop A L Fleming on war effort aid
